title: How to Cosplay As L Death Note

steps.headline: Buy a black wig - it is the most important part.
steps.description: You will have to make the wig more messy and crazy after it comes. Suggested places to buy your black wig is eBay. Otherwise, you could probably find one in the stores. Alternatively, if your hairstyle is similar to L's, you could also just dye your hair black. Use temporary dye if you don't want to walk around with black hair for longer than a couple of days.

steps.headline: Purchase some baggy jeans if you don't have any.
Wear a regular, white shirt.
steps.description: Buy one at Walmart, Target, etc. They shouldn't be expensive at all.

steps.headline: Have no earrings or accessories - whatsoever!
Apply mascara onto your eyelashes and/or smear some eye shadow under your eyes.
If you're not going outside, don't wear any shoes.
steps.description: If you are, wear some regular tennis shoes or flip-flops that don't really stand out.

tyn: A black wig or black hair dye
text: Buy a black wig - it is the most important part. You will have to make the wig more messy and crazy after it comes. Suggested places to buy your black wig is eBay. Otherwise, you could probably find one in the stores. Alternatively, if your hairstyle is similar to L's, you could also just dye your hair black. Use temporary dye if you don't want to walk around with black hair for longer than a couple of days. Purchase some baggy jeans if you don't have any.  Wear a regular, white shirt. Buy one at Walmart, Target, etc. They shouldn't be expensive at all. Have no earrings or accessories - whatsoever!  Apply mascara onto your eyelashes and/or smear some eye shadow under your eyes.  If you're not going outside, don't wear any shoes. If you are, wear some regular tennis shoes or flip-flops that don't really stand out.
